# 1980 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 1980 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 1981 for the 1980 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 1980 are as follows.
